content.question: Based on the class specification, which of the following descriptions is accurate?

choices.label: Vehicle objects are attributes of the variables make, model, and year.
Vehicle objects are behaviors of the variables make, model, and year.
The variables make, model, and year are attributes of Vehicle objects.
The variables make, model, and year are behaviors of Vehicle objects.

content.answer: The variables make, model, and year are attributes of Vehicle objects.

skill.text: 4.A: Describe the behavior of a code segment or program.
